variant=mchp-starter-eth
description=PIC32 Ethernet Starter Kit
group=Microchip
platform=pic32
board=_BOARD_PIC32_ETHERNET_STARTER_KIT_
board.flags=-D_USE_USB_FOR_SERIAL_::-D_USB
ccflags=ffff
ldscript=chipKIT-application-32MX795F512${upload.${prefs:board.${prefs:board}.programmer}.ldsuffix}.ld
upload.protocol=stk500v2
upload.maximum_size=520192
upload.speed=115200
build.mcu=32MX795F512L
build.f_cpu=80000000L
build.core=pic32
build.variant=mchp-starter-eth
family=pic32
version=0.3
revision=2
core=chipkit
name=mchp-starter-eth

bootloader.file=${board:root}/bootloader
